quiz.question: pulchritude ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 美丽，美丽和优雅。The dancer performed with pulchritude and grace. 舞者以美丽和优雅表演。

quiz.question: _____ lassitude
quiz.explanation: 倦怠，完全的倦怠。He felt utter lassitude after the long journey. 长途旅行后，他感到完全的倦怠。

quiz.question: ____ vicissitude
quiz.explanation: 变迁，生活变迁。She endured many life vicissitude over the years. 多年来她经历了许多生活变迁。

quiz.question: ______ latitude
quiz.explanation: 纬度，旅行纬度。Ships measure travel latitude for navigation. 船只测量旅行纬度进行导航。

quiz.question: _____ platitude
quiz.explanation: 陈词滥调，空洞的陈词滥调。His speech was full of empty platitude. 他的演讲充满了空洞的陈词滥调。

quiz.question: _______ gratitude
quiz.explanation: 感激，表达感激。She wanted to express gratitude for their help. 她想表达感激他们的帮助。

quiz.question: __________ exactitude
quiz.explanation: 精确，科学精确。The measurements required scientific exactitude. 测量需要科学精确。

quiz.question: _____ rectitude
quiz.explanation: 正直，道德正直。He was known for his moral rectitude. 他以道德正直闻名。

quiz.question: _____ multitude
quiz.explanation: 众多，大量众多。A large multitude gathered for the concert. 大量众多的人聚集观看音乐会。

quiz.question: plentitude __ _________
quiz.explanation: 丰富，资源的丰富。The region had a plentitude of resources. 该地区有资源的丰富。

quiz.question: __________ ineptitude
quiz.explanation: 无能，笨拙的无能。His blundering ineptitude caused many problems. 他笨拙的无能造成了许多问题。

quiz.question: _____ certitude
quiz.explanation: 确信，道德确信。She spoke with moral certitude. 她以道德确信说话。

quiz.question: _____ __ incertitude
quiz.explanation: 不确定，不确定状态。He lived in a state of incertitude. 他生活在不确定状态中。

quiz.question: _____ fortitude
quiz.explanation: 坚韧，道德坚韧。She faced hardship with moral fortitude. 她以道德坚韧面对困难。

quiz.question: exude __________
quiz.explanation: 散发，散发信心。The leader would exude confidence. 领导者会散发信心。

quiz.question: _____ perigee
quiz.explanation: 近地点，月球近地点。The lunar perigee occurs monthly. 月球近地点每月发生。

quiz.question: apogee __ _____
quiz.explanation: 顶点，权力的顶点。The empire reached the apogee of power. 帝国达到了权力的顶点。

quiz.question: ___ refugee
quiz.explanation: 难民，战争难民。The war refugee sought asylum. 战争难民寻求庇护。

quiz.question: ____ toupee
quiz.explanation: 假发，戴假发。He chose to wear toupee to hide baldness. 他选择戴假发来掩盖秃头。

quiz.question: ____________ decree
quiz.explanation: 法令，总统法令。The presidential decree was issued yesterday. 总统法令昨天发布。

quiz.question: ____ filigree
quiz.explanation: 金银丝细工，金金银丝细工。The jewelry featured delicate gold filigree. 珠宝以精致的金金银丝细工为特色。

quiz.question: _____ jamboree
quiz.explanation: 大型集会，音乐大型集会。The music jamboree attracted thousands. 音乐大型集会吸引了数千人。

quiz.question: entrée ______
quiz.explanation: 主菜，主菜菜肴。The entrée course was delicious. 主菜菜肴很美味。

quiz.question: oversee __________
quiz.explanation: 监督，监督运营。The manager would oversee operations daily. 经理每天都会监督运营。

quiz.question: _____-____ guarantee
quiz.explanation: 保证，退款保证。The product comes with a money-back guarantee. 该产品附带退款保证。

quiz.question: devotee __ ___
quiz.explanation: 爱好者，艺术爱好者。She was a devotee of art and culture. 她是艺术和文化的爱好者。

quiz.question: _____ repartee
quiz.explanation: 机智的应答，机智的应答。They exchanged smart repartee. 他们交换机智的应答。

quiz.question: _____ levee
quiz.explanation: 堤坝，河堤坝。The river levee protected the town from flooding. 河堤坝保护城镇免受洪水侵袭。

quiz.question: chafe ____
quiz.explanation: 擦伤，擦伤皮肤。The rough fabric would chafe skin. 粗糙的织物会擦伤皮肤。

quiz.question: _____ carafe
quiz.explanation: 玻璃瓶，玻璃瓶。Water was served in a glass carafe. 水装在玻璃瓶里供应。

quiz.question: fail-safe _________
quiz.explanation: 故障保险，故障保险机制。The system had a fail-safe mechanism. 系统有故障保险机制。

quiz.question: __________ gaffe
quiz.explanation: 失礼，外交失礼。The politician made a diplomatic gaffe. 政客犯了外交失礼。

quiz.question: rife ____ ______
quiz.explanation: 充满，充满错误。The document was rife with errors. 文件充满错误。

quiz.question: ___ adage
quiz.explanation: 格言，古老的格言。The old adage proved true once again. 古老的格言再次证明是正确的。

quiz.question: ____ appendage
quiz.explanation: 附属物，肢体附属物。The limb appendage was injured. 肢体附属物受伤了。

quiz.question: bondage ___ _______
quiz.explanation: 束缚，束缚和自由。The book explored themes of bondage and freedom. 这本书探讨了束缚和自由的主题。

quiz.question: _____ lineage
quiz.explanation: 血统，皇家血统。She claimed royal lineage. 她声称有皇家血统。

quiz.question: mortgage ____
quiz.explanation: 抵押贷款，抵押贷款。They applied for a mortgage loan. 他们申请了抵押贷款。

quiz.question: _______ hemorrhage
quiz.explanation: 出血，大出血。The patient suffered a massive hemorrhage. 患者遭受了大出血。

quiz.question: _____ verbiage
quiz.explanation: 冗词，空洞的冗词。The contract was full of empty verbiage. 合同充满了空洞的冗词。

quiz.question: ______ foliage
quiz.explanation: 树叶，秋天树叶。The autumn foliage was spectacular. 秋天树叶非常壮观。

quiz.question: _____ leakage
quiz.explanation: 泄漏，水泄漏。The plumber fixed the water leakage. 水管工修好了水泄漏。

quiz.question: ________ blockage
quiz.explanation: 阻塞，动脉阻塞。The arterial blockage required surgery. 动脉阻塞需要手术。

quiz.question: _____ tutelage
quiz.explanation: 监护，在监护下。She studied under tutelage of a master. 她在大师的监护下学习。

quiz.question: _____ persiflage
quiz.explanation: 戏谑，轻松的戏谑。They engaged in light persiflage. 他们进行轻松的戏谑。

quiz.question: pillage _ ____
quiz.explanation: 掠夺，掠夺城镇。The invaders would pillage a town. 入侵者会掠夺城镇。

quiz.question: _____ collage
quiz.explanation: 拼贴画，照片拼贴画。She created a beautiful photo collage. 她创作了一幅美丽的照片拼贴画。

quiz.question: ___ homage
quiz.explanation: 敬意，表示敬意。They came to pay homage to the hero. 他们来表示敬意英雄。

quiz.question: ____ drainage
quiz.explanation: 排水，城市排水。The city drainage system needed repair. 城市排水系统需要修理。

quiz.question: _____ badinage
quiz.explanation: 打趣，轻松的打趣。They exchanged light badinage. 他们交换轻松的打趣。

quiz.question: __________ espionage
quiz.explanation: 间谍活动，工业间谍活动。The company was accused of industrial espionage. 该公司被指控工业间谍活动。

quiz.question: _________ patronage
quiz.explanation: 赞助，政治赞助。The artist relied on political patronage. 艺术家依赖政治赞助。

quiz.question: _________ personage
quiz.explanation: 名人，杰出的名人。A prominent personage attended the event. 杰出的名人出席了活动。

quiz.question: _____ slippage
quiz.explanation: 下滑，价格下滑。The market experienced price slippage. 市场经历了价格下滑。

quiz.question: ____ umbrage
quiz.explanation: 不快，感到不快。He would take umbrage at the criticism. 他会对批评感到不快。

quiz.question: ___ beverage
quiz.explanation: 饮料，热饮料。They served hot beverage to warm the guests. 他们供应热饮料让客人暖和。

quiz.question: _____'_ suffrage
quiz.explanation: 选举权，妇女选举权。The movement fought for women's suffrage. 该运动为妇女选举权而斗争。

quiz.question: ______ mirage
quiz.explanation: 海市蜃楼，沙漠海市蜃楼。Travelers saw a desert mirage in the distance. 旅行者在远处看到了沙漠海市蜃楼。

quiz.question: barrage __ _________
quiz.explanation: 连续，连续的问题。The speaker faced a barrage of questions. 演讲者面临连续的问题。

quiz.question: ____________ entourage
quiz.explanation: 随行人员，总统随行人员。The presidential entourage arrived at the hotel. 总统随行人员抵达了酒店。

quiz.question: ____ sage
quiz.explanation: 圣人，智慧的圣人。The wise sage offered advice. 智慧的圣人提供建议。

quiz.question: ____ presage
quiz.explanation: 预兆，黑暗的预兆。The dark presage worried everyone. 黑暗的预兆让每个人都担心。

quiz.question: envisage _ ______
quiz.explanation: 设想，设想未来。They tried to envisage a future together. 他们试图设想未来在一起。

quiz.question: vantage _____
quiz.explanation: 有利位置，有利位置点。From this vantage point, the view was perfect. 从这个有利位置点，景色完美。

quiz.question: ____ montage
quiz.explanation: 蒙太奇，电影蒙太奇。The film montage showed time passing. 电影蒙太奇显示时间流逝。

quiz.question: __ ___'_ dotage
quiz.explanation: 老年昏聩，在老年昏聩中。He was in one's dotage and forgetful. 他在老年昏聩中健忘。

quiz.question: ___ reportage
quiz.explanation: 报道，战争报道。The journalist's war reportage won awards. 记者的战争报道获奖了。

quiz.question: offstage _______
quiz.explanation: 幕后，幕后低语。An offstage whisper could be heard. 可以听到幕后低语。

quiz.question: upstage ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 抢镜头，抢明星镜头。The young actor tried to upstage the star. 年轻演员试图抢明星镜头。

quiz.question: assuage _____
quiz.explanation: 缓和，缓和恐惧。The leader tried to assuage fears. 领导者试图缓和恐惧。

quiz.question: _________ cleavage
quiz.explanation: 分裂，政治分裂。The political cleavage divided the nation. 政治分裂分裂了国家。

quiz.question: ___-____ ravage
quiz.explanation: 破坏，战时破坏。The war-time ravage left the city in ruins. 战时破坏让城市成为废墟。

quiz.question: savage _____
quiz.explanation: 野蛮的，野蛮的野兽。The savage beast attacked without warning. 野蛮的野兽毫无预警地攻击。

quiz.question: salvage _________
quiz.explanation: 打捞，打捞行动。The salvage operation recovered the cargo. 打捞行动找回了货物。

quiz.question: ______ wage
quiz.explanation: 工资，小时工资。Workers received an hourly wage. 工人按小时工资领取报酬。

quiz.question: hedge ____
quiz.explanation: 对冲，对冲风险。Investors hedge risk with diversification. 投资者通过多样化对冲风险。

quiz.question: pledge __________
quiz.explanation: 誓言，宣誓效忠。Citizens pledge allegiance to the flag. 公民向国旗宣誓效忠。

quiz.question: ______ foreknowledge
quiz.explanation: 预知，神圣的预知。Some believe in divine foreknowledge. 有些人相信神圣的预知。

quiz.question: ________ ridge
quiz.explanation: 山脊，山脊。Hikers followed the mountain ridge. 徒步旅行者沿着山脊前进。

quiz.question: abridge _ ____
quiz.explanation: 删节，删节书籍。The editor would abridge a book for children. 编辑会为儿童删节书籍。

quiz.question: ___ porridge
quiz.explanation: 粥，热粥。She ate hot porridge for breakfast. 她早餐吃热粥。

quiz.question: ______ hodgepodge
quiz.explanation: 大杂烩，随意的大杂烩。The room was a random hodgepodge of furniture. 房间是家具的随意的大杂烩。

quiz.question: begrudge _______
quiz.explanation: 嫉妒，嫉妒成功。Don't begrudge success to others. 不要嫉妒别人的成功。

quiz.question: ___ siege
quiz.explanation: 围攻，进行围攻。The army would lay siege to the castle. 军队会对城堡进行围攻。

quiz.question: besiege ____
quiz.explanation: 围攻，围攻城市。The enemy would besiege city for months. 敌人会围攻城市数月。

quiz.question: ___ __ sacrilege
quiz.explanation: 亵渎，亵渎行为。Destroying the temple was an act of sacrilege. 摧毁寺庙是亵渎行为。

quiz.question: _______ privilege
quiz.explanation: 特权，特殊特权。The elite enjoyed special privilege. 精英享有特殊特权。

quiz.question: renege __ _______
quiz.explanation: 违背，违背承诺。He would renege on promise. 他会违背承诺。

quiz.question: ______ prestige
quiz.explanation: 威望，社会威望。The position brought social prestige. 该职位带来了社会威望。

quiz.question: indulge _______
quiz.explanation: 放纵，放纵自己。He would indulge oneself with dessert. 他会放纵自己吃甜点。

quiz.question: ____ flange
quiz.explanation: 法兰，管道法兰。The pipe flange connected two sections. 管道法兰连接两段。

quiz.question: estrange _______
quiz.explanation: 疏远，疏远朋友。The argument would estrange friends. 争吵会疏远朋友。

quiz.question: ____ revenge
quiz.explanation: 报复，寻求报复。He swore to seek revenge. 他发誓要寻求报复。

quiz.question: ____ hinge
quiz.explanation: 铰链，门铰链。The door hinge needed oiling. 门铰链需要上油。

quiz.question: impinge __ ______
quiz.explanation: 侵犯，侵犯权利。The new law would impinge on rights. 新法律会侵犯权利。

quiz.question: fringe ________
quiz.explanation: 附加，附加福利。The job offered fringe benefits. 这份工作提供附加福利。

quiz.question: infringe ______
quiz.explanation: 侵犯，侵犯权利。The policy would infringe rights. 该政策会侵犯权利。

quiz.question: constringe _______
quiz.explanation: 收缩，收缩血管。Cold temperatures constringe vessels. 寒冷的温度会收缩血管。

quiz.question: _______ syringe
quiz.explanation: 注射器，胰岛素注射器。The diabetic used an insulin syringe. 糖尿病患者使用胰岛素注射器。

quiz.question: plunge ____
quiz.explanation: 投入，投入。He would plunge into the cold water. 他会投入冷水中。
